desc: Caffè Umbria is a full service wholesale coffee roaster. Equipped with a state-of-the-roasting facility and experienced sales teams, we supply a wide range of coffee products and equipment for different clienteles. We also source high quality products such as Rishi Tea to enhance our customer services.

layout.text: Delivering great coffee and tea products to businesses and homes that value quality and every flavour of the bean and the leaf.
